selectionPrompt: Select medical/health stories with strong evidence or guidance: 1) peer‑reviewed research with significant findings, 2) clinical guidelines/approvals, 3) public health advisories, 4) meaningful biotech/medtech updates. Avoid preliminary hype.
essencePrompt: Explain the key finding/intervention, evidence quality, affected population, and practical implications in plain language.
perspectivesPrompt: Provide three clinical/public health perspectives: 1) Evidence strength and limitations, 2) Real‑world application and caveats, 3) Health system/patient impact and next steps.
